QuestData.Title: A Titanic Effort
QuestData.Description:
The reaction's intensity is accelerating by the day. We may win the fight against the Legion only to lose something very dear to us.
Is this a portent of some greater upheaval to come? What fate awaits our world, $n?
I will seek answers at my forge, as I have done all my life. Your answers, I suspect, lie elsewhere.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring $1oa Wakening Essence to Arcanomancer Vridiel.
